snippet.title: Lovely Hero Trailer (English)
snippet.description:
(Versión en español: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LMqpu9NfQ08&t=1s )

The game Lovely Hero is available to play!!
- Play in Android!: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Visuki.LH
- Play in iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/lovely-hero/id1457984790?l=es&ls=1&mt=8&fbclid=IwAR3hgiBpK2gC3lS5ad-3lcUf7Hos1injxwGfvrNGh-4oOzuVnf4qH6c9zoo

In our web and social media we will be telling you all the news about the released of the next chapters!

*.-*.-*.-*.-*.-*.-*.-*.-*.-*.-*.-*.-*.-*.-*.-*.-*.-*.-*
Web: www.visuki.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/visukiotomes
Twitter: www.twitter.com/visuki_otomes 
Instagram: www.instagram.com/visuki_otomes
*.-*.-*.-*.-*.-*.-*.-*.-*.-*.-*.-*.-*.-*.-*.-*.-*.-*.-*
